forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco greets the afternoon with an inviting embrace of mostly sunny skies, where the air is gently stirred by a light westward wind. The temperature dances around a mild 65, descending to a comfortable 60 as the day unfurls. The atmosphere is crisp and clear, hinting at a serene weather change. In this moment, the haze of fog seems to linger just beyond the Golden Gate, making an appearance only where the coastline meets the vast blue, but it does not intrude upon the vibrance of the day.

As evening approaches, the skies will maintain their charm, shifting to a partly cloudy canvas that boasts reflections of lingering daylight, all while the winds whisper around 7 mph. With a low around 50 anticipated, layering will be key to staying comfortable; think light sweaters or jackets that transition seamlessly as the sun dips behind the horizon. This delightful weather invites a stroll through the vibrant streets, perhaps catching the early evening glow as cafes spill warmth and laughter into the cool air, creating a tapestry of life that warms the heart. You may seek out quiet corners in parks to enjoy a good book or simply to take in the beauty of this cherished city, as it unfolds its gentle charm just for you.
